arStrings.szText: {c_important}Touch of Death's{/c} infection Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_4}*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_4})]){/c} per second for a total of {c_number}[{SF_4}*{SF_2}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,PlayerHealthMax() * {SF_4}*{SF_2})]){/c}. You Heal any remaining when the swarm hatches.

{c_important}Touch of Death's{/c} swarm bursts every second, applying {c_number}[{SF_32}*100|%|]{/c} of its Base Poisoning damage over {c_number}[{buffduration:POISON_DOT}]{/c} seconds to surrounding enemies.
{c_important}Touch of Death{/c} is now also a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill which costs {c_number}{SF_22}{/c} Vigor and has no Cooldown.
